snippet: The police said they had responded to nine domestic-dispute calls at the home of the toddler, Kevasia Edwards, from 2011 through 2013.
abstract: Queens district attorney's office says that Ashley Diaz, mother of 2-year-old Kevasia Edwards, has been charged with second-degree murder in what authorities describe as pattern of abuse that culminated in toddler's death; Diaz was taken into custody shortly after paramedics rushed her unresponsive daughter to emergency room with severe head trauma.

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and ASHLEY SOUTHALL

lead_paragraph: The police said they had responded to nine domestic-dispute calls at the home of the toddler, Kevasia Edwards, from 2011 through 2013.

headline.main: New York City Woman Is Charged in Killing of Daughter, 2
headline.print_headline: Woman Is Charged in Killing of Daughter, 2
